casebody.data:
P.R.M., Appellant-Respondent,
v.
STATE of Indiana, Appellee-Petitioner. Court of Appeals Case No. 32A04-1710-JV-2301 Court of Appeals of Indiana. May 9, 2018

DISPOSITION OF CASE BY UNPUBLISHED MEMORANDUM DECISION

BAILEY , J.

Reversed and remanded with instructions to vacate the adjudication.

MAY, J., Concurs.

ALTICE, J., Concurs.
